data.text: Hotel is exceptional…beautiful decor inside and outside .Close transfer to airport . 10 min taxi ride into old town.Heated pool a bonus. Drinks fridge in hotel room replenished every day free of charge ( water juice and beer) . Quality  food with plenty of options. Staff were so attentive especially Mehmet the waiter within the dining hall who couldn’t do enough to make sure our stay was going well. Highly recommend this hotel and would most definitely return. 10 out of 10 for every aspect
data.title: Exceptional…5 star treatment nothing to fault

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Sommer ,
Thank you for choosing the Rixos Downtown Antalya Hotel during your recent stay in our magical city.
We are honored that our teammates were able to take care of you within the Turkish hospitality. Appreciated for your compliments, your precious review has already been shared with the hotel management in order to encourage every staff and determine the aspects which we can develop thanks to your contributions. Rixos Downtown Antalya family is there for you to feel special and the best Rixos Moments to the depths, while enjoying the various facilities and easy access to attractions of the city. 
We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you at Rixos Downtown Antalya 
and make you feel the best Rixos Moments again as soon as possible!
Kind Regards ,
owner_response.author: Misafir  İlişkileri

data.text: The hotel staff is very friendly. We felt comfortable during the whole trip. The entertainment programme in the evening was good with live music. There is a kids club from 11am till late. The food variety was good  with some vegan options. I’d come again, it’s good for the family holidays.
data.title: Rixos Downtown Antalya

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Ekaterina K,

Thank you for taking the time to share an online review of our hotel following your recent stay at Rixos Downtown Antalya Hotel.

We are delighted that you enjoyed your time with us and that you made the most of the hotel facilities. Your comments and compliments have been shared with the hotel team members who look forward to welcome you again.

We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you at Rixos Downtown Antalya and make you feel the best Rixos Moments again as soon as possible!

Kind Regards,
owner_response.author: Misafir  İlişkileri

data.text:
Service was absolutely top notch - staff were always helpful, warm-hearted, had the initiative and were always ready with a smile. Shout-out to Eylem of the guest relations department who went way and beyond to assist me in finding the ID I lost at the airport and in making sure my stay was stress-free and amazing!

An incredibly wide array of delectable food and drinks were served in all the meal buffets. The live bands and cocktails I had in the evenings were a lot of fun, spa was incredibly clean and luxurious. My room had a breathtaking view (sunset especially) of the sea, pool and the majestic Taurus mountains as in wow!!! Definitely visit the stunning Konyaalti Beach which is only an escalator ride  away and the vibrant and historic Kaleici old town center. 

Thank you, Rixos Downtown Antalya, for making my first visit to Antalya, a most memorable and marvelous holiday. I will definitely be back!
data.title: An absolutely marvelous stay at the Rixos Downtown Antalya!

data.text:
Their facilities are excellent.
Excellent variety of breakfast, lunch and dinner.
Great staff attitude.
Excellent Wi-Fi. Excellent sports facilities.
Free reception in different parts of different times.
Great location.
It is in the real sense UALL
data.title: I was very satisfied with this hotel, The staff is very respectful to the customer

data.text: The experience at the Rixos has been fabulous with the family and I couldn't have asked for a more complete experience - right through check in, the rooms with amazing views, the staff across housekeeping, restaurants, bars and pool service. The family has truly enjoyed the wide variety of choices they have had from an entertainment perspective right from the pool and sport activities and the kids club.....will highly recommend the Rixos Downtown and cant wait to be back!
data.title: Best all inclusive experience in a long time!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Kartikarya,
Thank you for choosing the Rixos Downtown Antalya Hotel during your recent stay in our magical city.
Located in the heart of the city of Antalya, our hotel aims to provide its guests with unforgettable Rixos moments with its all-inclusive concept and different facilities in the center of the city.
We attach great importance to the evaluations of our guests regarding their accommodation, and we are moving towards our future goals in line with your evaluations. Therefore, we thank you very much for your detailed feedback. We are very glad to hear that we were able to make you feel the Rixos hospitality to the full during your stay. 

Together with our professional team members, we continue to develop and work to provide the best service to our guests.
We would like you to remember that we will be pleasure to welcome you again in our hotel in order to experience the Rixos hospitality in the best way with new experiences.
Kind Regards ,
owner_response.author: Misafir  İlişkileri
